alert.note: Alert for Indiana; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 5:30PM EDT until June 16 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN INDIANA AND SOUTHERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 530 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Punxsutawney, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Punxsutawney, Brookville, Reynoldsville, Sykesville, Falls Creek, Big Run, Rossiter, Glen Campbell, Timblin, Worthville, Smicksburg, and Anita. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
